selectStatements.query: SELECT REPLACE(A.RPD_VAR,'"',''),MAX(CASE WHEN A.MODULE_CODE IN (SELECT MODULE_CODE FROM CONTENT_ACTIVATED_MODULES WHERE ACTIVATION_STATUS='Y') THEN 'SHOW' ELSE 'HIDE' END) AS ACTIVATED_STATUS FROM CONTENT_SA_MODULE_MAPPING A WHERE A.MODULE_CODE IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.RPD_VAR
